entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. High plus 5. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 6. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 6. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
